head.title: Plane of the Future Is Showing Its Age

hedline.hl1: Plane of the Future Is Showing Its Age

block.p: Bad luck has plagued the Concorde from the day it began development in 1962, though until yesterday it had a pristine safety record. But the Concorde, once hailed as the plane of the future, has become a high-tech orphan. And in recent years the Concordes in commercial service -- all built in the 1970's or early 1980's -- had begun to show their age.
